message.content: This question requires some basic geographic knowledge and understanding of climate. The Arctic is located near the North Pole and experiences extremely cold temperatures, which allows snow to persist year round. Option (A), New Zealand, is incorrect because it does not have a year-round snowy climate. Option (C), Hawaii, is incorrect because it has a tropical climate and does not experience snow. Option (D), the beach, is also incorrect because beaches are typically associated with warm climates and not snow.
